articles.title: Exclusive-Yahoo nears deal to sell AOL to Italy's Bending Spoons for $1.4 billion, sources say
articles.description: New York (Reuters) -Yahoo is in advanced talks to sell AOL to Italian technology company Bending Spoons for about $1.4 billion, four sources familiar with the matter said, as the Apollo Global Management-backed firm sheds one of the most recognizable names of the early internet era.
articles.content: New York (Reuters) -Yahoo is in advanced talks to sell AOL to Italian technology company Bending Spoons for about $1.4 billion, four sources familiar with the matter said, as the Apollo Global Management-backed firm sheds one of the most recognizable... [2677 chars]

articles.title: China, Malaysia in talks for rare earths refinery project, sources say
articles.description: China ready to swap its technology for access to Malaysia’s untapped rare earths reserves, sources say. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: KUALA LUMPUR/BEIJING - China and Malaysia are in early talks for a project to process rare earths, with sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional likely to partner with a Chinese state-owned firm to build a refinery in the South-east Asian nation, peop... [3179 chars]
